body_text:
I have a feeling we might decide against sorting by enabled AND last updated, but this is what we originally discussed back in the day. (Since recipes are going to be edited more often while they're disabled, it might wind up making sense to nix the enabled sorting and just go with last_updated)
Fixes bug 1266480 r?
body_html:
I have a feeling we might decide against sorting by enabled AND last updated, but this is what we originally discussed back in the day. (Since recipes are going to be edited more often while they're disabled, it might wind up making sense to nix the enabled sorting and just go with last_updated)

Fixes bug 1266480 r?
title: Sort recipe list by enabled & last_updated
body:
I have a feeling we might decide against sorting by enabled AND last updated, but this is what we originally discussed back in the day. (Since recipes are going to be edited more often while they're disabled, it might wind up making sense to nix the enabled sorting and just go with last_updated)

Fixes bug 1266480 r?
